name: Opal

Using AI-driven sealed order execution, Opal ensures trades remain hidden until settlement, protecting users from front-running, predatory bots, and unfair advantagesâ€”even from the exchange itself. 100% of platform revenue is distributed to OPAL holders in ETH, establishing real token utility and passive income.
